name: The Ultimate General Knowledge Quiz | Mixed 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the capital of Ohio, USA?
Which sport is played with a ball constructed of panels similar to a geodesic dome?
questions.explanation:
Association football.

	Most soccer balls are many different combinations of colors.

questions.text: Who was the President of the United States directly before George W. Bush?
Who wrote 'Angels and Demons', a story set in Rome and featuring Harvard lecturer Robert Langdon?
questions.explanation:
Dan Brown.

	He also wrote 'The Da Vinci Code'.

questions.text: Name the Great Lake that begins with H.
What is it called when a piece of land is surrounded by water on all but one side?
Name the largest ocean in the world.
Which country has a coastline on the northern part of the English Channel?
How many dwarfs were in the movie 'Snow White'?
What is the capital of the United States?
